mxc_spi_master Struct Reference


Data Fields

unsigned int bus_num
unsigned int maxchipselect
unsigned int spi_version
void(* chipselect_active )(int cspi_mode, int status, int chipselect)

Detailed Description

This structure is used to define the SPI master controller's platform data. It includes the SPI bus number and the maximum number of slaves/chips it supports.

Field Documentation

unsigned int bus_num

SPI Master's bus number.

void(* chipselect_active)(int cspi_mode, int status, int chipselect)

CSPI chipselect pin table. Workaround for ecspi chipselect pin may not keep correct level when idle.

unsigned int maxchipselect

SPI Master's maximum number of chip selects.

unsigned int spi_version

CSPI Hardware Version.
